PATIENT_ID: TEST_TBI_EDGE_002
ARRIVAL_TIME: 2026-01-21 12:00:00

[TRAUMA_HP] 2026-01-21 12:10:00
Category I trauma activation for 50-year-old female, fall from height (20 feet).
Suspected traumatic brain injury.
Primary survey: BP 110/70, HR 95, RR 18, GCS 12.
Patient with scalp laceration and left pupil dilated.
GCS assessed after adequate cardiopulmonary resuscitation: GCS 12.

[TRAUMA_HP] 2026-01-21 12:45:00
ADDENDUM to trauma H&P.
Repeat GCS assessment: GCS 9. Patient deteriorating.
Right pupil now also dilated. GCS reassessment after resuscitation shows decline.
CT head shows bilateral subdural hematomas.

[PHYSICIAN_NOTE] 2026-01-21 13:00:00
Two H&P notes documented. GCS assessed post-resuscitation in both.
GCS trending down from 12 to 9. Neurosurgery emergently consulted.
